website_summaries.verdict: Easy installation method for a high quality filter that is from atrustworthy brand.
pros: Kit includes a magnet that helps with capturing impurities
Simple design, but it will do the job for several thousand miles without leaking
Price point is better than we’d expect to find for this brand
cons: Shipping care is questionable, as magnet occasionally arrives broken

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Allison transmission and magnet combination
customer_reviews.text: This kit is the only kit to get when you aren't sure what happened to the magnet. It is IMPERATIVE that the magnet is present between this filter and the transmission housing. Replace the filter every 12000 miles with a drain and refill of 7.4 quarts Dexron VI in your Duramax/Allison transmission.
customer_reviews.author: USA1

customer_reviews.title: Filter From Allison and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This filter also includes a new magnet in case the original was lost or broken. Allison makes it easy to service your transmission by providing a spin on filter for their transmissions. The magnet goes on with the filter and is designed to catch any loose metal particulate in the transmission. At change you can simply clean it and reuse it with a new filter. this is an excellent value ! Easy DIY project to extend the life of your Allison trans.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Broken magnet.. don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from one vendor and received a box with a broken magnet inside, so did a return and ordered another from a different vendor, and received a broken magnet on that one also. If it we're just a magnet, could throw it away and just use the filter, but that defeats the purpose of the magnet. My concern is wete do all those little magnet pieces go... Probably inside the filter, on the output side to be fed right into the transmission.
customer_reviews.author: EureskoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal RED filter!
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove and a very high quality unit. Accept nothing less than original Allison fluids and filters. Don't forget the magnet! Also, prefill the filter with correct fluid before installing otherwise it will bring the transmission fluid down. Check your fluid level on a HOT check per factory instructions and procedures and verify readings with repeated dipstick measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W.

customer_reviews.title: Allison filter
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than the AC Delco! Plus this one was built by the Allison manufacturer for the Allison Transmission. I switched to these a few years ago and have never had an issue or complaint.
customer_reviews.author: TylerZ06

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on a genuine replacement part.
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have found a kit that actually included the magnet, and all at a reasonable cost! For some reason during one of the last maintenance trips, someone forgot to replace the magnet on the trans filter during the change. It is very much needed, so having the ability to get it with the replacement filter made it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Nissan GTR Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Broken Magnet
customer_reviews.text: i should have checked inside the box before i took the old one off, the magnet was in two pieces broken.! i should have taken the hint when i saw that the box had been taped with and extra piece of clear packing tape. I've used these filters before and have never had this problem. i would have returned but needed to get my truck back together. I just used there old magnet.
customer_reviews.author: David Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Transmission Insurance
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Super easy to replace this filter, so cheap insurance for a very expensive transmission. Appears to be an authentic, made in USA, OEM filter. It came very well packed in a seperate box, so there was no damage, and it is well sealed. The magnet is attached and protected on the filter itself. I will get one for every 10,000 mile change for sure.
customer_reviews.author: IdaLogix

customer_reviews.title: Good filter
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat OEM. Had the magnet in the box. Good thing I got the magnet because the last guy who did the filter change forgot the magnet on the old filter and threw it away. Good price. Better than the dealer. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Me myself and I mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was a little leery on ordering this filter with the magnet. Seems the magnet would get broken in shipping. Mine arrived in one piece and was much stronger than the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Dog 19

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, I will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, undamaged, and it fit great. 2006 Chevy Silverado 2500HD Duramax. Fill up your new red Allison filter with Transynd transmission fluid before re-installing. Only use transynd transmission fluid for the Allison 1000 transmission. This is the only fluid that protects this transmission!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: True Allison filter
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. True Allison filter so I know it will work the way Allison intended. Not worth taking a risk with a transmission that would cost many thousands of dollars to replace if an after market filter didn’t do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: o.e.m. replacement with magnet
customer_reviews.text: spot on o.e.m. replacement for the allison 1000 backed to a duramax or 8.1l gas engine. it comes with the magnet so you dont even have to clean that off.
customer_reviews.author: BowtieWill

customer_reviews.title: Factory magnet and filter
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. My Chevy dealer had serviced my transmission a year ago. I changed the spin on filter this time and found NO magnet with the filter from the dealer. Great value and factory parts
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Allison filter for my Duramax WITH THE MAGNET shipped to my door for a lot less than the AC Delco version from the stealership. Wish I had found this years ago...
customer_reviews.author: Adj

customer_reviews.title: Allison approved
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat it I’m not sure why you would run a different filter in an Allison. Needed a new magnet this worked good
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation!  Replaces filter and magnet that accidentally got tossed!
customer_reviews.text: Good as new. Perfect fitment, genuine Allison filter, no problems, magnet sticks to the filter very well, easy installation. Now I know (and have to remember) to remove the magnet before swapping next filter!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Shortt

customer_reviews.title: Item just as described
customer_reviews.text: Item fit my 2018 Silverado 2500 HD diesel perfectly. Took about 5 minutes to install. Dealer wanted $90 to change/service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OEM product for Allison transmission....
customer_reviews.text: OEM product for Allison transmission.... Very happy for the price and shipping... Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Allison transmissions
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for this filter kit compared to GM prices. Fit on my 2006 Chevrolet Duramax perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JLN

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Allison Cheaper than Dealer
customer_reviews.text: Product is genuine Allison filter, mine did come with the magnet and was relatively undamaged. I ended up reusing the magnet on my transmission, but I have an extra now. Will reorder when it is time to change the fluid again.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Wagner

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, Allison filter. Fits my truck, no leaks in the couple months it’s been on

customer_reviews.title: Good Diesel Fuel Filter!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price, prompt delivery. GM/ AC Delco product.

customer_reviews.title: great replacement
customer_reviews.text: great buy for replacing spin on transmission filter. Price and quality is great

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to check for the magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 2005 GMC 2500HD, glad I got this one with the magnet because when I pulled the old filter there was no magnet, this is the first time I changed the filter. I guess it pays to service your own truck, you know what is going in your truck!

customer_reviews.title: The factory part
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly onto the Allison 1000 transmission in my Workhorse-based motor home.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change
customer_reviews.text: This filter is very easy to replace with a minimal loss of fluid. Too bad all transmissions didn't have a filter like this to help extend the life of the transmission.

customer_reviews.title: Oem

customer_reviews.text: What more can one say, it is a OEM filter made for my Allison. Good price and quick delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Someone had thrown away my magnet on the filter... This is what is supposed to be on tbe Allison trans!

customer_reviews.text: Definitely a correct Allison filter I couldn't ask for more for maintenance!!

customer_reviews.title: 2006 Chevy 2500 , LBZ Duramax
customer_reviews.text: The filter arrived on time and was packaged well. It fit like it should and the new magnet was nice since I had been reusing my old one.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2016 Silverado 2500HD Duramax with the Allison transmission.

customer_reviews.title: Good thing my old one is still ok
customer_reviews.text: Magnet came crushed/broken. Good thing my old one is still ok. They need to do a better job packaging this item. People buy thebon with the magnet FOR A REASON.

customer_reviews.text: Great Price and Fitment even included a new magnet A+. Shipped fast as well.

customer_reviews.text: This was a good price for the filter and the magnet is free in case the last one got throne away.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit and finish. Appears to be well built and has a strong magnet insert

customer_reviews.text: A+ only one I will continue to buy for my 2008 chev 2500hd. You get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.text: Filter arrived on time looks like the real deal, but magnet was broken and pieces were in the filter. I was not able to use this filter.

product_meta.title: Allison 29539579 Screw-on Filter with Magnet Filter Kit replacing filter for Allison transmission per OEM Specs
product_meta.description: Genuine Allison replacement spin-on external filter and magnet. Allison recommends changing this spin-on filter after initial 5,000 miles of use. This Allison genuine spin on filter is one of the most widely used and recommended oil filters for the Allison 1000/2000 transmission. Included with purchase is one Transmission Magnet
feature_bullets: Genuine Allison External Spin On Filter 29539579
Included with purchase is one Transmission Magnet
The magnet is required to be changed with the filter to capture possible particulates in oil.
